catalysts.thesis: Critical Phase 3 SOL-1 topline data for AXPAXLI (wet AMD) due Feb 17; 'single biggest biotech catalyst of the week' with potential acquisition interest from Sanofi if positive.
catalysts.catalyst_details: Company confirmed on Feb 13 that topline Phase 3 data will be presented via webcast on Tuesday, Feb 17 at 8:00 AM ET.
catalysts.absorption_status: Unpriced Anticipation. Stock closed down 2% on Friday amidst broad market weakness, offering a discount before the binary event.
catalysts.risk: Binary Event Failure (Data miss would severely impact stock)
catalysts.mispricing_evidence: Stock is trading significantly below analyst targets ($22.56 avg) despite approaching pivotal de-risking event.

catalysts.thesis: Major shareholder Tempus AI (10% Owner) aggressively accumulated ~$2.7M worth of shares between Feb 11-13, signaling strong undervaluation confidence.
catalysts.catalyst_details: SEC Form 4 filed Feb 13, 2026, disclosing purchase of 320,267 shares at prices ~$8.55-$9.00.
catalysts.absorption_status: Unpriced. Filing dropped after market close Friday; After-hours price rose 4% to $8.55.
catalysts.relative_volume: Low (Volume fell on pullback, bullish divergence)
catalysts.mispricing_evidence: Insider buying at prices above current close ($8.55 avg buy vs $8.21 close).
